mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_message where recev_name = #{recev_name} and gubun = 0

SELECT rowNo, msg_id, msg_title, msg_content, recev_name, gubun, create_dt, sender_name, me_email, read_yn FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY create_dt DESC) AS rowNo, msg_id, msg_title, msg_content, recev_name, gubun, create_dt, sender_name, me_email, read_yn FROM tbl_message WHERE recev_name = #{recev_name} AND gubun = 0 ) AS subquery ORDER BY create_dt desc LIMIT 5
